cause.description:
Our goal is to rid the streets of the morally corrupt drunken youths with their gay hoodies, Hip Hop, Ghetto attitude even though they are all middle class white kids with hard working cricket coach, accountant parents.
1. Everyone has a right to kick a chav in the nuts
2. Smash their mobile phones that play AKON remixes
3. Destroy Tim Westwood
cause.mission: Destroy and put to death all chavs
cause.name: Putting chavs down fund
